reviews.text:
La Casa Vallet i Xiró is a Modernist building in the Eixample district of Barcelona and one of many examples of Modernist or Catalan Modernist buildings in the locality. `The building was designed by Josep M. Barenys i Gambús and the facade is highly symmetric with the usual striking features being the wrought iron balconies and two bay windows on either side of the main balcony on the first floor.

Not a must see especially as there’s already so many monumental or just fantastic Modernist buildings in the vicinity. Worth a look if you in the area and have time.
Casa Vallet i Xiro is a beautiful building. Stunning Art Nouveau architecture and eye catching. Did not go inside but we loved those balconies.
